means.word_mean: 1. American revolutionary leader who signed the Declaration of Independence and was president of the Continental Congress (1731-1796)
2. United States railroad executive who built the western section of the first United States transcontinental railroad (1821-1900)
3. a city of western West Virginia on the Ohio river at the mouth of the Kanawha
